Articles.Content:
Hi, I've been really stuck on getting custom sounds working on a new engine.

The Sounds are located in GameData/Beale/Parts/DarkMatterEngine/sounds

They are

-sound_darkDrive.wav

-sound_darkStart.wav

In the part.cfg I have this


sound_darkStart.wav = engage
sound_darkDrive.wav = power
sound_darkStart.wav = disengage
sound_darkStart.wav = flameout

At first I thought it might be a problem with the .wav files themselves, but after replacing them with renamed stock sounds that didn't fix it.

I'm sure I'm missing out on something really simple, but I've been looking at other mods that use custom sounds and they don't seem to be doing anything differently in the .cfg than me.

Thanks for any help .

Edit: I probably should mention that the sounds aren't working at all, this isn't a problem with distorted sound effects or other problems I've seen people having.

Edited June 24, 2013 by Beale

Sorry to bump this, but I'm just not having any luck at all with this.

I've looked at the Firespitter parts and Stock parts and can't find a single difference in the config files.
